sentence: , having sucked dry the undead action flick formula , blade ii mutates into a gross-out monster movie with effects that are more silly than scary .
every visual joke is milked , every set-up obvious and lengthy
practically every facet of inept filmmaking
shows how deeply felt emotions can draw people together across the walls that might otherwise separate them .
some of the dramatic conviction that underlies the best of comedies
has a way of seeping into your consciousness
